dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2499 IH: To codify Executive Order 14248, entitled “Preserving and Protecting the Integrity of American Elections”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Hamadeh of Arizona (for himself and Ms. Tenney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14248, entitled Preserving and Protecting the Integrity of American Elections.

section.header: Codifying Executive Order relating to preserving and protecting the integrity of American elections
section.text: Executive Order 14248, entitled Preserving and Protecting the Integrity of American Elections (90 Fed. Reg. 14005), shall have the force and effect of law.
